The JavaScript issue is being worked on.  I've submitted one patch
for the enabled/disabled attribute on buttons and that patch is now
in the repository ready for the next release.  I am working with a
group of tech leads to improve (or basically create) the support for
html table objects (and sub-elements/attributes/etc...) within the
JavaScript support of httpUnit.  We already have basic row and cell
addressing working in the JavaScript support (all tested of course).

I have offered help in this area several times on the httpunit mail
list but haven't received a lot of enthusiasm.  So now that we are 
running into some issues, we are going to fix them and submit patches.

Mike Corum
